UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: D- and N-Methyl Amino Acids for Modulating the Therapeutic Properties of Antimicrobial Peptides and Lipopeptides
Literature.Author: Humpola MV, Spinelli R, Erben M, Perdomo V, Tonarelli GG, Albericio F, Siano A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=298.5±12.0 µM,Human erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=2.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus BSF FBCB1313(MIC=2.8µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5.6µM),Candida albicans PEEC 2(MIC=89.7µM),Candida tropicalis DBFIQ 3(MIC=179.5µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=>400µM)
